summary: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.
cast: Roddy McDowall|Don Murray|Ricardo Montalban|Natalie Trundy|Severn Darden|Hari Rhodes|Lou Wagner|John Randolph|Asa Maynor|H.M. Wynant|David Chow|Buck Kartalian|John Dennis|Paul Comi|Gordon Jump|Dick Spangler|Joyce Haber|Hector Soucy|James Bacon|Rayford Barnes|William Bassett|Erlynn Mary Botelho|Maxine Botelho|William Bryant|Jean Byron|Sam Chew Jr.|Tony Dante|Francis De Sales|Peter Paul Eastman|Erin Fleming|Bob Harks|Kathryn Janssen|Daniel Keough|Paul King|Monty O'Grady|Ron Pinkard|Hank Robinson|Victor Romito|Clark Ross|Jeffrey Sayre
